description.value: Information specific to the internationl address from FREG (internasjonalAdresse)

definition.value:
building name or number from FREG (bygning)
adresseegenskap som beskriver navn og/eller nummer på bygning

comment.value: Reasoning not to use iso21090 extensions: iso21090-unitID - is for id's within a building or complex iso21090-additionalLocator - is for additional locators within a building or in addition to houseNumber, streetName etc.
